## Vector3.axisNX() method

Creates a new Vector3 pointing in the negative direction of the X axis, i.e. vec3(-1, 0, 0)

**Signature:**

```typescript
static axisNX(): Vector3;
```
**Returns:**

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)

The new vector
